item.title: SwiftUI - View Modifiers
item.description: ViewModifier is a basically a protocol that used to encapsulate and apply a set of changes or modifications to a view. It has a body(content: Content) that accept a user-defined content and return some View after applying changes or modifications. It is very useful when you have a set of modifications like Stylings or Behaviours etc. and you want to apply them on multiple views without code being redundant. Let’s understand by an example.
